title: Tutorial Clue. Type 'HALLOWEEN2025' to unlock
text: I guard the things that tread the ground, yet I make no move, I make no sound. Open my door and look inside - the first step forward is where I hide.
answer: Behind the shoe closet door near the front of the house.

title: Clue 1
text: It's round and clear, with faces you know. Look underneath where love and memories show.

title: Clue 2
text: It hangs where cold things hide behind, With days and nights all neatly lined. Turn the page or lift it high - Your next clue waits where the dates lie.
answer: Behind the October calendar on the refrigerator.

title: Clue 3
text: Where water runs and shadows creep, secrets hide where the pipes sleep. Open the door, don't overthink - your next clue waits beneath the sink.
answer: Behind the door of the cabinet under the sink in the basement bathroom.
